abstract: Google offers powerful online voice mail features of Google Voice without forcing users to get a new phone number.
snippet: Google offers powerful online voice mail features of Google Voice without forcing users to get a new phone number.
lead_paragraph: Google Voice, the Swiss Army knife telecommunications service that unifies multiple phone lines, transcribes voice mails, blocks telemarketers, makes cheap phone calls and more, has gotten plenty of buzz. But signing up for Google Voice comes with a hefty price: It requires people to get a new phone number.

headline.main: Google Voice ‘Lite’ — No New Number Required

abstract: Researchers at the University of California, San Diego, have created the Whole Brain Catalog — a detailed simulation of a mouse’s brain that users can move through like Google Earth.
snippet: Researchers at the University of California, San Diego, have created the Whole Brain Catalog — a detailed simulation of a mouse’s brain that users can move through like Google Earth.
lead_paragraph: Mouse brain enthusiasts can finally relax. They have a place of their very own to hang out, swap stories and share information.

headline.main: A Virtual Voyage Through the Brain of a Mouse
